overview: The employees of Frightening Fast VCR Repair and Ghost Removal show up to work on a Saturday to review the 2016 Reboot of Ghostbusters. (Parody / Reboot of RedLetterMedia's Half in the Bag review of Ghostbusters 2016)
tagline: They're here to save the world.
title: Fully in the Bag: Ghostbusters 2016
